attributes.action: Permamently ban Katie Hopkins from all forms of social media on grounds of bullying.
attributes.additional_details:
People have had their Facebook and Twitter accounts suspended or even removed because of the vile verbal attacks on people, so why is Katie Hopkins allowed to get away with it?

You look at the posts she sends out there and you ask yourself why does she have the right to be so vile and harsh and be defended for it? Or even be allowed to continue her hate filled tirade at any group of people who slightly displease her without any intervention from the social media companies.

She should be removed from the public eye permanently for the things she does and says.

rejection.details: There are now laws against hate speech etc, but it is a matter for the police to decide.
